item.title: Understanding AWS CloudFormation Template Syntax
item.description: Introduction AWS CloudFormation is a powerful service for provisioning and managing AWS infrastructure as code (IAC). To effectively use CloudFormation, it’s crucial to understand the syntax of CloudFormation templates, as they serve as the blueprints for your infrastructure. In this guide, we’ll explore the essential elements and syntax of CloudFormation templates.
